home
view on bēhance

sagoo is a vintage themed restaurant in bandung, indonesia. they made chinese fusion with singaporean style dishes. sagoo also sell nostalgic items on the side as a "waroeng". this the one academy project brings back nostalgic toys and candies in indonesia with the packaging experience. the set includes a paper bag, bola bekel, gasing bamboe, and permen rokok.
